lead_paragraph: They talked all night, and they are still talking.
snippet: The brief extensions of the talks -- granted at midnight, and again at 3 a.m. -- indicate that News Corporation and Time Warner Cable made progress in their dispute overnight.

headline.main: A Little Headway in the New Year?

abstract: The brief extensions of the talks -- granted at midnight, and again at 3 a.m. -- indicate that News Corporation and Time Warner Cable made progress in their dispute overnight.
